name: Repair-grandson
description:
It has been a long long while.
As a repairman,
you got a phone call from your grandma, asking you to come by this week.
It seems that she would like to ask you for a favour.

--
Controls:
A, D | left, right: to move.
W | up: to pick up an item or to perform actions when an item is equipped.
S | down: to drop an item.
E: to play with the mini-game in action.

Spoiler:
We would like to express that a relationship requires constant maintenance. Fixing all the material items is not the way to win but the game. But to talk to your grandma, find out what she wants and care for her is the key. 
--
